principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Star Charts with Streaming UI
Emotion First: Discovery feels like space exploration
Content is King: The graph IS the hero
Negative Space: Deep space void is essential
Contrast: Glowing nodes against deep black

theme.reasoning: Star maps and futuristic interfaces require a dark canvas to create depth and glow effects.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Unbounded' for all H1-H3. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Uppercase for labels.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Outfit' for all paragraphs and UI text. High legibility.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,215,0,0.3)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(255,215,0,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 bg-white/5 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 backdrop-blur-md transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-white/60 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl
cards.movie_card: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 group hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

inputs.search_bar: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full px-6 py-4 text-lg text-white placeholder:text-white/40 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 transition-all w-full max-w-2xl shadow-lg

graph.node_style: Custom Canvas rendering: Glowing circles. Top recs = Gold, Others = Grey/Blue.
graph.link_style: Thin, low opacity lines (rgba(255,255,255,0.1)). Highlight on hover.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on glass backgrounds has sufficient contrast. Use text-shadow if needed.
accessibility.keyboard_nav: Ensure graph nodes are focusable and navigable via keyboard.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the colors provided. Force dark mode.
3. LAYOUT: Create a layout with a full-screen absolute positioned graph container and z-indexed UI overlays.
4. GRAPH: Implement the graph first. It is the core. Use dummy data for nodes (movies).
5. GLASS: Apply the 'glass' utility classes to the Sidebar and Right Panel.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (nodes, buttons, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic AI aesthetics. No purple/teal gradients unless specified.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
